DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to examine the long-term weight loss and safety of CP-945,598 in obese adults
DOC.brief_title: A Long-Term Study To Examine The Effects Of CP-945,598 On Weight Loss And Safety
DOC.detailed_description: The CP-945,598 program was terminated on November 3, 2008 due to changing regulatory perspectives on the risk/benefit profile of the CB1 class and likely new regulatory requirements for approval. No safety issues were involved in the termination decision.
DOC.criteria: Obese adults with a body mass index > or = 30 kg/m2; > or = to 27 kg/m2 for those with obesityrelated comorbidities including hypertension and dyslipidemia Pregnancy Diabetes Adults with serious or unstable current or past medical conditions
